cast.overview: An English pianist living in Rome witnesses the brutal murder of his psychic neighbor. With the help of a tenacious young reporter, he tries to discover the killer using very unconventional methods. The two are soon drawn into a shocking web of dementia and violence.
cast.title: Deep Red

details.biography: Clara Calamai was born on September 7, 1909 in Prato, Tuscany, Italy. She was an actress, known for The Adulteress (1946), Deep Red (1975) and Obsession (1943). She was married to Leonardo Bonzi. She died on September 21, 1998 in Rimini, Emilia-Romagna, Italy.
details.name: Clara Calamai
